trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie would share the findings of your scouting mission with everyone.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Chai-Nuzz.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Dulia-Chai.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Tristol.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Soon after you left, who should arrive in Amity but Urianger and the Exarch. I'm glad they were able to find you.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_THANCRED_000_005<tab>I'm told you went ahead to scout out the volcano. I don't suppose some grappling hooks will suffice?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_RYNE_000_0010<tab>A-All that grinding and shaking... I-I was afraid the lift floor would fall out from underneath me...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_RYNE_000_011<tab>B-But don't worry! I-I'm sure the trembling will go away s-soon!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_URIANGER_000_015<tab>Thus are we all gathered...though Ryne, I am afeared, did not much enjoy the ascent.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Forgive us our delay. The Exarch arrived and we took some time to apprise him of our mission.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_025<tab>...Concerned for my health, are you? Indeed, we are a little far from the Crystarium, but rest assured this old man can muster up another wind for what is to come.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_030<tab>Oh, don't mind us. We're just taking in the sights.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_035<tab>Ahhh, such an exhilarating ride! And such a magnificent view! Nothing in Eulmore compares to this!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_040<tab>Shall we see how we might be of service?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_045<tab>When he asked for my hand, my husband promised that he would one day build a Talos that could take us to the very heavens. And now he'll do it!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_050<tab>Have the design ready, she says! In good time, she says! Does she even understand what's involved!?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_051<tab>Before I can even attempt to design anything, I need intimate knowledge of the land─the knowledge of locals. Last I heard, no one lives here!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_052<tab>What? A village of Eulmoran exiles!?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_053<tab>B-But...those people have every reason to loathe a free citizen like me! They couldn't possibly be willing to cooperate!

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_054<tab><sob> This will never work. <var 1A 02 /var>Never<var 1A 01 /var>. I never should've fixed that ruddy lift. Never should've ridden it up here... Never should've...never should've...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_060<tab>I can't do it... It's impossible...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_070<tab>Oh dear, darling appears to have lost the plot...

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_071<tab>But he has it in him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. He's the cleverest man I know─he just wants for confidence sometimes. If you were to give him some words of encouragement, I'm sure he can give you your Talos.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_072<tab>A bit of advice I learned from his mother: he responds poorly to obvious praise. You'll need to find another way to stoke the fires of his motivation─awaken his sense of daring!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Choose words that will best encourage Chai-Nuzz.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_074<tab>In order to succeed, you must lift his spirits sufficiently during the conversation.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>Encourage Chai-Nuzz!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>Chai-Nuzz is burning with motivation!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_077<tab>Chai-Nuzz is feeling somewhat optimistic.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>Chai-Nuzz still harbors some misgivings.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_079<tab>Chai-Nuzz is plagued with self-doubt.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Chai-Nuzz has given up completely.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_081<tab>I can't do it. No one can. A Talos of that size...no one's even dreamed of it.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A1_000_001<tab>Alphinaud once struggled to collect firewood.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A1_000_002<tab>Dulia is counting on you as well.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A1_000_003<tab>You're a genius! You can do this!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_082<tab>He did? But...he's such a capable lad, brimming with confidence.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_083<tab>Hmmm... I suppose even the most capable among us have struggles to overcome...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_084<tab>But regardless of my own feelings, I can't do a damn thing without help from those villagers...and they're not bally likely to give it!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_085<tab>I know, I know! You hardly need to tell me that! Do you think I'd disappoint her if I could help it!?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_086<tab>But regardless of my own feelings, I can't do a damn thing without help from those villagers...and they're not bally likely to give it!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_087<tab>Oh, it's simple as that, is it? You say some magic words and I can suddenly do the impossible? Don't make me laugh!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_088<tab>As I said, I can't do a damn thing without help from those villagers...and they're not bally likely to give it!

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_089<tab>Tristol's among them, you said so yourself! Lest you've forgotten, we essentially sent him to his death! Even if the others don't bear a personal grudge, <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> would never forgive us!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A2_000_001<tab>You don't know until you apologize. I'll come with you.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A2_000_002<tab>Don't worry! He'll forgive you for sure!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A2_000_003<tab>Things won't improve by themselves. You have to take the first step.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_090<tab>Hmmm... If you were there too, perhaps he'd be more willing to accept an apology...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_091<tab>W-Wait... What am I thinking, relying on others to fight my battles? It's disgraceful, is what it is, and it might even make things worse...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_092<tab>And in the end, it's not even a question of forgiveness. Building such an enormous Talos is impossible, and no amount of contrition will change that!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_093<tab>How can you make such blithe claims without proof? You're either naive or you think I am─and I most certainly am not!

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_094<tab>And whatever you say, in the end it's not even a question of forgiveness. Building such an enormous Talos is impossible, and no amount of contrition will change that!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_095<tab>I know, I know... Unless we take the first step, there can never be reconciliation.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_096<tab>This is a chance for everyone to come together. Even if they hurled stones at me, perhaps it's worth trying to apologize...

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_097<tab>But what then? In the end, it's not even a question of forgiveness. Building such an enormous Talos is impossible, and no amount of contrition will change that.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_098<tab>And even if by some miracle the people of Amity were willing to let bygones be bygones, they'd think that the plan is absurd! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> think it's absurd!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A3_000_001<tab>It's less absurd than the change that's come to Eulmore.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A3_000_002<tab>We liberated a castle with a strategy that many would call absurd.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A3_000_003<tab>Everything you touch turns to gold! No one would doubt your plan!

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_099<tab>Well, I can't argue with that logic... Enormous as the task is, it's simply a matter of finding a solution to a practical problem. From that perspective, it's not entirely unrealistic.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_100<tab>But realistic or no, there's no guarantee of success. There are risks to consider should the venture fail.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_101<tab>Well now, to flood the very castle you sought to reclaim... Such a strategy could indeed be considered absurd. Yet you succeeded not in spite of, but because of it.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_102<tab>Our own strategy may likewise seem absurd, but maybe─just maybe it stands a better chance of success for it...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_103<tab>But be that as it may, there are risks to consider should the venture fail.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_104<tab>I've no idea where that absolute confidence of yours comes from, but it only makes me feel more wary!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_105<tab>And even assuming there's a semblance of realism to the plan, have you considered the risks should the venture fail?

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_106<tab>Aye, imagine for a moment that we fail to reach Vauthry and only succeed in provoking him. In his fury, he may well unleash his hordes of eaters and we'll meet a horrible end!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A4_000_001<tab>Then we'll go together!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A4_000_002<tab>I'll protect you. I'll protect everyone.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A4_000_003<tab>We could build Talos for battle.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_107<tab>Oh, so I can die with you!? How very kind of you to offer! But if it's all the same, I'd rather keep on living!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_108<tab><sigh> How can you remain so...so <var 1A 02 /var>optimistic<var 1A 01 /var> throughout all this? It's downright tiring...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_109<tab><gasp>
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_110<tab>I-I see what you did there. That's how you win over the masses─with that irrepressible aura of dependability.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_111<tab>But very well, you've made your conviction clear...and I'm assured in spite of myself. I won't let my fears get the better of me. It's unseemly if nothing else.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_112<tab>Still, I find it astounding that you can have such certainty given the circumstances.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_113<tab>I've thought of that, I assure you, but I'm afraid Talos cannot contend with sin eaters. If they could, I would never have come to Eulmore.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_114<tab>Nonetheless, I appreciate your earnest attempt to find a solution.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_115<tab>It makes me wonder, what is it that drives you?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_116<tab>Tell me, why did you throw yourself into the midst of such a grueling struggle?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A5_000_001<tab>To protect those I love.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A5_000_002<tab>Because I live for adventure.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A5_000_003<tab>I got roped into it...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_117<tab>...!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_118<tab>Indeed... What else could compel us to face such dangers? I too have someone I wish to protect, with whom I want to live out my days in peace...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_119<tab>Adventure... Such a strange word coming from my lips... I used to have a sense of adventure too. Strove to challenge myself. Whenever did I lose it?

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_120<tab>So you do not fight willingly. Just like me. We may put on a smile, but behind it there's only doubt. If even your heart isn't in it, there's no hope for any of us. No point in building the Talos.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>You failed to encourage Chai-Nuzz. Speak with Dulia-Chai to try again.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_122<tab>Yes... Yes! By the gods, I can do this! I just need to have a little faith in myself!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_123<tab>Right, let's head to Amity and speak with the villagers─with Tristol.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_124<tab>My love, things are liable to become more dangerous. I want you to wait for me back in Eulmore.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_125<tab>No. Wherever you go, I'm going too.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_126<tab>Besides...you're not the only one who has to apologize.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_127<tab>B-But there's no telling what may happen out here! I don't know if I can keep you safe!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_128<tab>P-Perhaps this is a bad idea after all... I-I don't think I have what it takes...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_129<tab>Master Chai. That you are beset with doubt is proof that you can envision the task ahead.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_130<tab>And that which man can envision, he can make reality. Thus did some old friends of mine once say.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_131<tab>Even should it be a feat fit for the divine, if something has been done before, then it most assuredly can be done again by our own hands.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_132<tab>That's a little idealistic, don't you think!?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_133<tab>Perhaps, Master Chai, perhaps. But what is man if not an idealistic creature?

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_134<tab>'Tis not an easy thing to achieve one's dreams─my friends can attest to that. Countless times did they meet with frustration in the course of their endeavors.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_135<tab>None would have found fault with them had they given up, yet they never did. One step after the next, they forged on towards their goals.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_136<tab>And for their determination, they accomplished numerous feats that many believed lay beyond the reach of mankind.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_137<tab>Like them, you are a man of science. Amidst your doubts, surely there is a spark of desire. The desire to make the impossible possible.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_DULIACHAI_000_138<tab>Come, darling. Like the old days, I would be the first to see your Talos.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_139<tab>And you shall be, my dear. I would have none other at my side when my greatest masterpiece awakens.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_140<tab>Right, then. To Amity.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_141<tab>I am glad my words struck a chord. Shall we?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_150<tab>Y-You!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_151<tab>You have every right to be angry with us. But please listen to what I have to say.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_152<tab>I am tasked with delivering these people to Mt. Gulg─by means of a Talos of heretofore unseen proportions.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_153<tab>However, I cannot do this without the cooperation of those with intimate knowledge of this land. That is, you and your fellow villagers.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_154<tab>...Cooperation? After you ignored my desperate pleas and cast me out, you have the gall to come here and ask for my cooperation?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_155<tab>You've every right to be upset. Vauthry's not the one to blame for your suffering─we are.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_156<tab>We were free citizens without a care in the world, indifferent to the hardship of others. We didn't know what would become of you, and frankly, we didn't care.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_157<tab>But we know now that what we did to you─to full many─was wrong. Terribly wrong. No words will suffice to make amends, but I want you to know that we are deeply sorry.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_158<tab>I'm not sure how I feel.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_159<tab>Should I forgive you? Hate you? Perhaps it's not even my place to judge. After all, I sought a place in your city. I wanted to be you, once...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_160<tab>But one thing is clear to me.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_161<tab>All of that is in the past. And we mustn't let past wrongs stand in the way of a brighter future.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_TRISTOL_000_162<tab>And so...I will cooperate with you. Please see our friends to Mt. Gulg.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_163<tab>You have my word!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_164<tab>I'll set to work on the design at once. Wouldn't do to have nothing to show the others when they return with help.

TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_165<tab>Make no mistake, this venture is unprecedented in the history of Talos building─nay, the history of all mankind! But rest assured this genius of Daedalus Stoneworks will deliver!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_166<tab>Ah, wicked white!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_MYSTERYVOICE_000_167<tab>Is there a problem?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_168<tab>Well...er, you see... I've been promised people to procure the stone as well as imbue magic.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_169<tab>When I was put on the spot earlier, I thought that was all we required.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_170<tab>But I forgot about one rather important item needed to bring a Talos to life...
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A6_000_001<tab>The heart?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_A6_000_002<tab>What is it?
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_171<tab>That's right, the heart! I'm pleased to see you have some familiarity with Talos!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_172<tab>The heart! The godsdamned, bally heart! Without one, a Talos is just a hunk of rock!
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_173<tab>So, while I work on the design, I'd be much obliged if you could see to procuring the ore with which to fashion a heart.
TEXT_LUCKME107_03636_CHAINUZZ_000_174<tab>A heart suitable of bringing to life a Talos that shall embrace the very firmament!
